I really wanted to like this Bluetooth speaker, but unfortunately, it fell short in a few key areas. First, the sound quality is pretty underwhelming. The bass is weak, and the overall audio feels tinny and flat. It‚Äôs not the immersive sound experience I was hoping for, especially considering the price.Second, I‚Äôve experienced frequent connectivity issues. The speaker disconnects randomly from my phone, even when they‚Äôre just a few feet apart. I‚Äôve tried troubleshooting, resetting it, and even using a different device, but the issues persist.The build quality isn‚Äôt much better. The plastic feels cheap, and I‚Äôm worried it won‚Äôt hold up well over time.Overall, I‚Äôm really disappointed. I expected more for the price, and I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this speaker to anyone looking for good sound and reliable performance.
